features: GIVES OFF NATURAL LIGHT - This sun lamp provides bright, natural light that makes it easier to see while reducing eye stress. This 150-Watt light bulb gives off the same amount of light that you see on a normal sunny day. Perfect for working, reading, or any detailed art project.
CONVENIENT - Simple On/Off switch located right below the light bulb. Easy to assemble. Please consult the easy to read user manual.
MULTI-DIRECTIONAL- Adjustable gooseneck simplifies moving the lamp into the position that is most ideal for your personal usage. Comes in seven finishes making it great for bedrooms and office desks.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Color: Black, Lamp Dimensions- 7”x9”x22”. Cord length: 64”

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - Lavish Home is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Lavish Home and ONLY Natural Sunlight Desk Lamp by Lavish Home are GUARANTEED to be genuine.
body.description: "Lavish Home provides a compact and easy to use desk lamp that brings natural light into your home with the simple flip of a switch. The provided 150-Watt light bulb supplies natural light that increases the release of serotonin, linked to an improved feeling of well-being while also putting less strain on your eyes. This lamp is perfect for reading, working, or doing any detailed artwork. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Lavish Home is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all our products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process. Lavish Home is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended. "

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with nice natural light.
reviews.reviewText: I got a floor model of one of these from my father-in-law that I started using for a desk lamp when I started working from home (due to the COVID19 pandemic) like many others. I liked the floor model so well that I bought this desk top version. Bright natural light that works well for a desk or bench lamp. I rated light weight 3 stars because it is very sturdy with a heavy base. I don't imagine anyone carrying this around for any length of time that its weight would matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 12 years old and still working like a champ
reviews.reviewText: Next month I will have had this lamp for 12 years. There were periods where I didn't use it very often (worked out of an office, so no need for my desk lamp), but over the last couple of years I have worked from home exclusively and this little guy has been put to work. I live in the Pacific Northwest and the months from November through May can be pretty dreary. This lamp illuminates my desk far better than the glow of my monitors or the lighting from around the room, reduces eye strain, and makes the dark days a little brighter (pun intended). I have yet to replace the bulb, but it's great to see that this model is still being sold and replacements are still available if needed. As others have mentioned, the lamp's base does have a large footprint, so it takes up a bit more desktop real estate than I would like, but that doesn't make me love this lamp any less. It's not fancy (I have the black plastic model), but it blends in with my black monitors and computer/network hardware just nicely.If you're looking for a nice, bright lamp that will help you see your tasks, hobbies, reading, etc., and don't mind choosing function over form, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these lamps.
reviews.reviewText: I have had a number of these, both desk and floor models, all flourescent, for many years. They're cheap enough where a few have been given away when I moved and no longer had room.A couple showed up with scratches or other defects but Amazons return/exchange process is so easy.But the light these things throw is great. I suffer from depression and they help my mood and energy so much. I've brought one to jobs where the overhead flourescent lighting was dingy yellow or too blue.My wife now works from home and the desk and floor model are on all day morning to night with no issues. Thousands of hours of use on the original bulbs.I want to hate them because they aren't the most pleasing in form and the desk model's base requires desk space but they work so well and you can't beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars bright but not light therapy bright
reviews.reviewText: Came in plain shipping box, no internal product box. No owner manual, just some instructions on the box with the included bulb. Bulb didn't work when installed with electrical specifications visible so I flipped it over so "made in China" was visible and it worked. That shouldn't matter so I assume it just didn't click quite into place for me and I didn't notice. Light is bright but lacks the warm tone of my other sunlight/light therapy lamp. I'll probably keep it but I doubt I'll buy another. I thought it would have the same spectrum but it doesn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice desktop Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I used to own a lamp like this in gray and it lasted for years so I'm hoping this one will also have a long life. So glad it came with a bulb. I'm happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I hated it as soon as I plugged it in
reviews.reviewText: I hated it as soon as I plugged it in! It is a good desk lamp, provides bright light that does not appear to be harsh on the eyes. My complaint is that the light appears to be pure white, and has a very cold cold COLD feel to it. It is also VERY BRIGHT and only has one setting. I have a sunrise alarm clock that gives a wonderfully warm feeling simulated sunrise lighting. I was hoping for a lamp that would provide a similar type of lighting.I will be returning this item and continuing my research on lamps that provide lighting that helps with sunlight deprivation and also provides a nice, warm feel to the lighting, and hopefully some controls for adjustable brightness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NICE COMPOSITION LED LAMP
reviews.reviewText: The lamp has a nice construction, but the one I ordered never came on. Strange light bulbs, I'm not sure if they are all like this. So I'm not the best to recommend or decline. I simply returned it and didn't try them again. The worst is to need a lamp and be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: had 2 verilux, this uses same bulb and seems ad good and way less expensive
Don't bother to buy it If you are buying it to use outside US. Mine works for couple of mins and the tube stop working. As the wattage not suitable for Australia.

Purchased about a year and a half ago for couple of plants at the office. On a timer and works well. The only thing is the bulb loses its intensity after about a year so needs to be replaced but that is expected.
The bulb arrived broken. It will cost more money to buy another bulb for this product.

The lamp is as described and provides a more natural light, easy on the eyes. It is physically bigger than what I was expecting but its design and flexibility allowed it to fit on my small office desk. I would highly recommend at this price.
